The discussion primarily focused on technical implementation questions related to Hyperfy worlds. ## 2. FAQ:
Q: How do I add the voice chat to my space? (asked by Nicola Bertoglio) A: You need to setup a LiveKit server or use LiveKit cloud service and set the parameters in the .env file (answered by mrtzhckr)
Q: How do I manage roles for players? (asked by 0mka) A: Use the Free Build option in world settings or give people builder role in the players list (answered by ash)
Q: Is there a reason we cant access the localStore directly? (asked by Gh0stt) A: Scripts are sandboxed, you can't access the window object (answered by smickelbeard)
